column4: installing ubuntu for the first time, will 64bit be harder to learn than 32bit?
I see no difference in 32 versus 64 in learning
so the 64bit has similar driver / software support?
as far as I can see yes.  I just installed Mythbunutu64 today and everything is running fine. All hardware is working and after running apt-get to install the gnome desktop everything is great.
